alert.note: Alert for Dodge; Laurens; Montgomery; Telfair; Wheeler; Wilcox (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 2:24PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Laurens, Dodge, Telfair, eastern Wilcox, Wheeler and Montgomery Counties through 300 PM EDT... At 224 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Achord, or near McRae, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... McRae, Eastman, Abbeville, Alamo, Mount Vernon, Helena, Lumber City, Glenwood, Milan, Uvalda, Ailey, Rhine, Scotland, Chauncey, Higgston, Alston, Jacksonville, Tarrytown, Union and Towns. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.

area.areaDesc: Dodge; Laurens; Montgomery; Telfair; Wheeler; Wilcox
